member.name: T:Yuniql.Core.ILocalVersionService
member.summary: Interface for implementing service responsible for initializing and managing the local workspace. A local workspace is a directory where yuniql operations are operated from.

member.name: M:Yuniql.Core.ILocalVersionService.Init(System.String)
member.summary: Creates the baseline directory structure in the target workspace path.
member.param: The directory path where workspace structure will be created.

member.name: M:Yuniql.Core.ILocalVersionService.GetLatestVersion(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the latest version available in the local workspace.
member.param: The directory path when yuniql operations are executed from.

member.name: M:Yuniql.Core.ILocalVersionService.IncrementMajorVersion(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new major version migration directory by incrementing the latest major version.
member.param: The directory path where yuniql operations are executed from.
File name of sql file to be created.
member.returns: The version created in v{Major}.{Minor} format.

member.name: M:Yuniql.Core.ILocalVersionService.IncrementMinorVersion(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new minor version migration directory by incrementing tha latest version.
member.param: The directory path where yuniql operations are executed from.
File name of sql file to be created.
member.returns: The version created in v{Major}.{Minor} format.

member.name: M:Yuniql.Core.ILocalVersionService.Validate(System.String)
member.summary: Validates the baseline directory structure. The following directories are always required to be present in the workspace else the migration would fail. Required folders are _init, _pre, v0.00, _draft, _post, and _erase.
member.param: The directory path where yuniql operations are executed from.

member.name: T:Yuniql.Core.IMigrationService
member.summary: Runs migrations by executing alls scripts in the workspace directory.

member.name: M:Yuniql.Core.IMigrationService.GetCurrentVersion
member.summary: Returns the current migration version applied in target database.

member.name: M:Yuniql.Core.IMigrationService.GetAllVersions
member.summary: Returns all migration versions applied in the target database
Runs migrations by executing alls scripts in the workspace directory. When CSV files are present also run bulk import operations to target database table having same file name.
member.param: The directory path to migration project.
The maximum version to run to. When NULL, runs migration to the latest version found in the workspace path.
When TRUE, creates the database in the target host.
Token kev/value pairs to replace tokens in script files.
When TRUE, runs the migration in uncommitted mode. No changes are committed to target database. When NULL, runs migration in atomic mode.
Delimeter character in the CSV bulk import files. When NULL, uses comma.
Command timeout in seconds. When NULL, it uses default provider command timeout.
Batch rows to processed when performing bulk import. When NULL, it uses default provider batch size.

member.name: M:Yuniql.Core.IMigrationService.Erase(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair{System.String,System.String}},System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.String)
member.summary: Executes erase scripts presentin _erase directory and subdirectories.
member.param: The directory path to migration project.
Token kev/value pairs to replace tokens in script files.
Command timeout in seconds.

member.name: T:Yuniql.Core.IMigrationServiceFactory
member.summary: Factory class of creating instance of .

member.name: M:Yuniql.Core.IMigrationServiceFactory.Create
member.summary: Create instance of with default platform provider

member.name: M:Yuniql.Core.IMigrationServiceFactory.Create(Yuniql.Extensibility.IDataService,Yuniql.Extensibility.IBulkImportService)
member.summary: Create instance of and uses external data services. When targeting PostgreSql or MySql, this is where you can pass the implementation of and .
member.param: Platform specific data service providing compatible SQL statements and connection objects.
Platform specific service provding support for bulk import of CSV files.
member.returns: An instance of and uses external data services.

member.name: T:Yuniql.Core.ITokenReplacementService
member.summary: Interface for implementing replacement of tokens in the script using the pattern ${TOKEN_KEY}. Throws exception and fails the migration when some tokens not replaced due to missing token values passed from the client.

member.name: M:Yuniql.Core.ITokenReplacementService.Replace(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair{System.String,System.String}},System.String)
member.summary: Runs token replacement process.
member.param: List of token Key/Value pairs.
Raw SQL statement where tokens maybe present.
member.returns: SQL statement where tokens are successfully replaced.

Runs migrations by executing alls scripts in the workspace directory. When CSV files are present also run bulk import operations to target database table having same file name.

member.name: T:Yuniql.Core.PluginAssemblyLoadContext
member.summary: This is a collectible (unloadable) AssemblyLoadContext that loads the dependencies of the plugin from the plugin's binary directory.

member.name: M:Yuniql.Core.PluginAssemblyLoadContext.Load(System.Reflection.AssemblyName)
member.summary: The Load method override causes all the dependencies present in the plugin's binary directory to get loaded into the HostAssemblyLoadContext together with the plugin assembly itself. The Interface assembly must not be present in the plugin's binary directory, otherwise we would end up with the assembly being loaded twice. Once in the default context and once in the HostAssemblyLoadContext.
member.param: The assembly name to load.

Raw SQL statement where tokens maybe present.

member.name: T:Yuniql.Core.TraceSettings
member.summary: Global settings for checking the level of trace message to write.

member.name: P:Yuniql.Core.TraceSettings.IsDebugEnabled
member.summary: When true, trace messages will include debug messages.

member.name: P:Yuniql.Core.TraceSettings.Instance
member.summary: Global singleton instance of trace settings

member.name: P:Yuniql.Core.YuniqlConfiguration.WorkspacePath
member.summary: The directory where yuniql-based migration project is placed. This is a required property.

member.name: P:Yuniql.Core.YuniqlConfiguration.Platform
member.summary: Target database platform. Value can be `sqlserver`,`postgresql`, or `mysql`. Default is `sqlserver`.

member.name: P:Yuniql.Core.YuniqlConfiguration.ConnectionString
member.summary: The connection string to the target database server. This is a required property.

member.name: P:Yuniql.Core.YuniqlConfiguration.AutoCreateDatabase
member.summary: When true, automatically creates database in target database server.

member.name: P:Yuniql.Core.YuniqlConfiguration.TargetVersion
member.summary: Runs migration only up to the version specified in this property. Defaul is Null and will run upto latest.

member.name: P:Yuniql.Core.YuniqlConfiguration.Tokens
member.summary: The list of token key/value pairs to repair tokens in each script file.

member.name: P:Yuniql.Core.YuniqlConfiguration.VerifyOnly
member.summary: When you run yuniql verify, it checks if all your versions can be executed without errors. It runs through all the non-versioned script folders (except _init) and all migration steps that yuninql run takes but without committing the transaction. All changes are rolledback after a successful verification run.

member.name: P:Yuniql.Core.YuniqlConfiguration.Delimiter
member.summary: Delimter to use when parsing CSV bulk import files. Default is comma ",".

member.name: P:Yuniql.Core.YuniqlConfiguration.BatchSize
member.summary: The size of each batch when performing bulk load. Default is 100 rows. This may not be used in non-sqlserver platforms.

member.name: P:Yuniql.Core.YuniqlConfiguration.CommandTimeout
member.summary: The time it taks to wait for one commend to execute before it expires and throws error. Use this prorty to adjust time out when you expect a long running migration execution.

member.name: P:Yuniql.Core.YuniqlConfiguration.DebugTraceMode
member.summary: Enrich trace messages with raw sql statements and more verbose diagnostic messages. Use this when you are investigating some failed migrations.

member.name: T:Yuniql.Core.YuniqlMigrationException
member.summary: Custom exception thrown within yuniql migration.

member.name: M:Yuniql.Core.YuniqlMigrationException.#ctor
member.summary: Custom exception thrown within yuniql migration.

member.name: M:Yuniql.Core.YuniqlMigrationException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates new YuniqlMigrationException.
member.param: The exception message.

member.name: M:Yuniql.Core.YuniqlMigrationException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Creates new YuniqlMigrationException.
member.param: The exception message.
The exception captured prior to this exception.
